title: Fix search functionality, category filters, currency, location management, and restaurant listings

requirements.text: Implement working search functionality in the SearchBar component on the HomePage to filter restaurants by name, cuisine, or dish when user types in the search input

quotes: Search bar isn't working. make it working.

acceptanceCriteria: Search input filters the displayed restaurant cards in real-time as user types
Search matches against restaurant name, cuisine types, and menu item names
Search is case-insensitive
Clear search button appears when input has text

requirements.text: Make the CategoryFilter component functional so that clicking a category button filters the displayed restaurants to show only those matching the selected category

quotes: the 'whats your mind' filter should be working which ever the item i'm selecting

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking a category button highlights it as active
Only restaurants matching the selected category are displayed
Clicking the same category again deselects it and shows all restaurants
Category filter works in combination with search functionality

requirements.text: Change all price displays throughout the application from USD ($) to INR (₹) including cart items, menu items, price breakdown in cart sidebar, and restaurant cards

quotes: Use INR currency instead of dollar because this app is for Indian users

acceptanceCriteria: All prices display with ₹ symbol instead of $
Price formatting follows Indian number system conventions
Currency change applies to all components: MenuItem, CartSidebar, RestaurantCard

requirements.text: Enhance the LocationSelector component to allow users to manually enter a delivery address or use their current browser location for delivery

quotes: Give the access to change the address manually or use current location for the delivery.

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking LocationSelector opens a modal or dropdown with two options: 'Enter Address Manually' and 'Use Current Location'
Manual entry provides a text input field for address entry with save functionality
Current location option requests browser geolocation permission and displays the detected address
Selected address is displayed in the LocationSelector button
Address persists in application state

requirements.text: Expand the restaurant listings on HomePage from 6 to at least 20 restaurants with diverse cuisine types and ratings
acceptanceCriteria: HomePage displays at least 20 restaurant cards
Restaurants include variety of cuisines beyond current Pizza, Chinese, Fast Food, and Desserts
Each restaurant has realistic sample data including name, rating, cuisine, delivery time, and distance

requirements.text: Add at least 8 category options in the CategoryFilter component ('What's on your mind' section) including current categories plus new options like Burgers, Biryani, North Indian, South Indian

quotes: give more options in 'whats your mind' section

acceptanceCriteria: CategoryFilter displays at least 8 category buttons
New categories use appropriate Lucide React icons
Each category has corresponding restaurants in the expanded listings
Horizontal scroll works smoothly with increased categories

requirements.text: Implement a 'View All' button in the featured restaurants section on HomePage that opens a full-page scrollable list of all restaurants with a search bar at the top

quotes: When user clicks on the view all section the list of the restaurent will open and have scrolling. Also, have a search bar

acceptanceCriteria: View All button is clearly visible in the restaurants section header
Clicking View All navigates to a new page or opens a modal showing all restaurants
Page includes a search bar for filtering restaurants
Restaurant list is vertically scrollable
Each restaurant entry maintains card layout with image, rating, cuisine info

requirements.text: Update RestaurantCard component to display both the numeric rating and the number of people who have rated the restaurant (e.g., '4.5 (1.2K ratings)')

quotes: the cars have the ratings of the restaurent. about how many people have rated

acceptanceCriteria: Each restaurant card shows rating number followed by count of ratings in parentheses
Rating count uses abbreviated format for large numbers (e.g., 1.2K, 5.3K)
Rating and count are visually grouped together
Star icon accompanies the rating display

constraints: Do not modify immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Preserve existing cart functionality and state management
Keep React, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn component patterns consistent with existing code
nonGoals: Real-time location tracking or GPS integration beyond browser geolocation API
Backend persistence of user addresses or preferences
Integration with external restaurant APIs or databases
Payment processing or actual order placement functionality
User registration or authentication beyond existing Internet Identity
